citations.narrative:
The IACUC semiannual reports and the letter to the IO for the October 2024 meeting are missing and cannot be accessed
for review at the time of inspection. The IACUC chair/AV has the meeting on her calendar but is unable to locate the
paperwork. Inspection of these records is necessary for evaluation of compliance under the Animal Welfare Act. Per 9
Code of Federal Regulations (CFR) 2.35(f), all required records must be available for inspection by authorized APHIS
representatives. To be corrected from this date, 7/9/2025 forward.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
n

narrative:
2.35(f)  Repeat
   
Recordkeeping requirements. 
The IACUC semiannual reports and the letter to the IO for the October 2024 meeting are missing and cannot be accessed 
for review at the time of inspection. The IACUC chair/AV has the meeting on her calendar but is unable to locate the 
paperwork. Inspection of these records is necessary for evaluation of compliance under the Animal Welfare Act. Per 9 
Code of Federal Regulations (CFR) 2.35(f), all required records must be available for inspection by authorized APHIS 
representatives. To be corrected from this date, 7/9/2025 forward. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
